hero.presentation: Hello, I’m Ailén, Front End Developer based in Buenos Aires.
hero.description: An Industrial Designer, with a certification in User Experience and Interfaces and, currently, I am focused on developing skills as a Front End Development. I also have knowledge and practices in Graphic Design.

about.title: About Me.
about.fragment1: My transition from industrial design to web development marked an exciting and unique shift in my career. My background in industrial design provided me with unique skills in conceptualization, creative thinking, and problem-solving. These abilities, combined with my passion for learning and determination, propelled me into the world of web development.
about.fragment2: Now, as an aspiring Front End Developer, my design-oriented approach, meticulous attention to detail, and ability to grasp user needs become a competitive edge in the IT sector.
about.fragment3: I'm eager to apply my blend of skills and experience to web projects that are not only functional but also visually appealing and user-centered.

phrase.phrase: 'Don't be afraid to start over, you might like your new story better.'

experience.title: Experience.
experience.description: I had the opportunity to work on various projects, including: 3D rendering, rebranding, illustrations and content design for social networks. I have worked both on projects from scratch and on projects already started, using different tools and programs to carry out each project successfully.
experience.cta: I invite you to see my work on Behance

projects.title: Projects.
projects.description: During my career in different trainings, I focused on the development of the Front End, working on various projects. Throughout the development of each one of them, I gained experience both in the implementation of pure code solutions and in the use of frameworks and templates to create interactive and attractive interfaces.
projects.cta: See all my projects on GitHub.

education.title: Education.
education.description: I have invested in my professional growth and development through a series of specialized courses. These formative experiences have allowed me to acquire new skills and knowledge in key areas such as graphic design, web programming and the use of development tools.

course-5.title: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures Certification

course-6.title: Full Stack Developer (PHP y SQL) Diploma

contact.title: Contact.
contact.subtitle: Follow Me.
contact.description: I'm looking for opportunities. I'm excited to join a committed team.

footer.author: Site designed and coded with by Ailén Glassmam
